text: jo log uthate baithate karavat lete (alagaraz har haal mein) khuda ka zikr karate hain aur aasamaanon aur zameen kee banaavat mein gaur va fikr karate hain aur (besaakhta) kah uthate hain ki khudaavanda toone isako bekaar paida nahin kiya too (phele abas se) paak va paakeeza hai bas hamako dozak ke azaab se bacha
